parameters.name: LeaderStyle
parameters.description: Leader style as defined in swLeaderStyle_e

parameters.name: ArrowHeadStyle
parameters.description: Arrowhead style as defined in swArrowStyle_e

title: ISketchBlockInstance.SetLeader
description: Sets the leader style for this block instance.
signature:
System.Boolean SetLeader( 
   System.Int32
LeaderStyle
,
   System.Int32
ArrowHeadStyle
)

parameters.name: LeaderStyle
parameters.description: Leader style as defined in swLeaderStyle_e

parameters.name: ArrowHeadStyle
parameters.description: Arrowhead style as defined in swArrowStyle_e

returns: True if the leader style is set, false if not
